articles.content: When John Major was prime minister in the 1990s, the actor Jonny Lee Miller was best known for playing the peroxide-haired Sick Boy in Trainspotting and for his tabloid-friendly marriage to Angelina … [+2476 chars]

articles.author: Olivia Gantzer
articles.title: Steve Fletcher shares concern over Jay Blades and King Charles meeting: 'Oh my word' - Express
articles.description: Steve Fletcher opened up about fears he had as he watched The Repair Shop co-star Jay Blades meeting King Charles III, admitting the royal's officials had to intervene following Jay's interactions with the monarch.

articles.author: Christian Edwards, CNN
articles.title: A UK TV station bought a painting by Hitler. A studio audience will vote on whether to destroy it - CNN
articles.description: British broadcaster Channel 4 has received stinging criticism over plans for a new show that will allow a studio audience to decide whether to destroy a painting by Adolf Hitler.
